testcase.name: initializationError
testcase.error:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Couldn't create a file output stream for 'target/HtmlReports'. Make sure the the file isn't a directory.
Note: This usually happens when plugins write to colliding paths. For example: 'json:target/cucumber/report.json, html:target/cucumber' You can fix this by making the paths do no collide. For example: 'json:target/cucumber/report.json, html:target/cucumber/report.html' The details are in the stack trace below: at
